title: Google\Cloud\Dataproc\V1\GkeNodePoolConfig\GkeNodeConfig
name: GkeNodeConfig
description:
Parameters that describe cluster nodes.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.dataproc.v1.GkeNodePoolConfig.GkeNodeConfig

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.machine_type
params.description: Optional. The name of a Compute Engine machine type.

params.name: data.preemptible
params.description: Optional. Whether the nodes are created as preemptible VM instances.

params.name: data.local_ssd_count
params.description: Optional. The number of local SSD disks to attach to the node, which is limited by the maximum number of disks allowable per zone (see Adding Local SSDs).

params.name: data.accelerators
params.description: Optional. A list of hardware accelerators to attach to each node.

params.name: data.min_cpu_platform
params.description: Optional. Minimum CPU platform to be used by this instance. The instance may be scheduled on the specified or a newer CPU platform. Specify the friendly names of CPU platforms, such as "Intel Haswell"` or Intel Sandy Bridge".
